programme.title: Trinity and Sartana Are Coming
programme.desc: Sartana and Trinity set out on a grudging relationship hell bent for gold and comic brawls.

programme.title: Patience Has a Limit, We Don't
programme.desc: During the Civil War, Corporal MacDonald hides a large gold shipment meant for the Union. Before he can retrieve it, he's killed—taking the secret location with him. Now, a Union lieutenant and MacDonald's two sons compete to uncover the buried treasure in a tense hunt filled with danger and deception.

programme.title: Quintana: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: In a Mexican province oppressed by the evil Governor Don Juan de Leyra, the rebel-outlaw Quintana is the sole guardian of justice.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: $100,000 for Ringo
programme.desc: Stranger Lee Barton rides into Rainbow Valley, mistaken for a man thought dead. As tensions rise with ruthless town boss Tom Cherry—who's after hidden gold and the affections of a local woman—Barton is drawn into violence and revenge. With a sheriff's help, he seeks justice and a new start with a boy who believes he's his father.

programme.title: Heroes of Fort Worth
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a group of confederate soldiers with the help of Apache Indians, try to defeat a Union fort, while trying to gain support from Emperor Maximillian of Mexico.

programme.title: The Great Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A blind man wants to get his mitts on a crooks' gold. He can't do it alone, so he hires the quartet of soldiers-of-fortune to help him.

programme.title: The Godless Ones
programme.desc: An outlaw and a bounty hunter are searching for Mexican bandit Corbancho, who is running the El Paso area, and has also robbed the Bank of Tuscon of $400,000.

programme.title: Tepepa
programme.desc: In early 20th-century Mexico, the guerrilla leader Tepepa is saved from execution by Doctor Price, an Englishman. Tepepa, a hero of the Revolution, is curious about the doctor’s motives. The chilling answer: to kill him himself. A deadly game of cat and mouse begins between Tepepa and the ruthless police chief, Cascorro.

programme.title: The Executioner of God
programme.desc: A former gunman turned priest seeks vengeance on three bandits who are masquerading as law-abiding citizens.

programme.title: A Few Dollars for Django
programme.desc: Regan, a bounty hunter looking to start a new life, is pulled back into action when a murder sends him after bank robbers. In Montana, he steps into a range war between farmers and cattlemen while investigating. With a sheriff's star in hand, Regan must navigate dangerous territory to bring justice while seeking his own peace.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre
programme.desc: 10,000 Dollars for a Massacre - Django has become a bounty hunter who is asked to chase a villain who has kidnapped a young girl.

programme.title: Run, Man, Run
programme.desc: Several competing groups and mavericks (including the lead character Cuchillo) are hunting a gold treasure of $3,000,000. The gold was reserved for the Mexican revolution.
